#summary jgen.Sprite.clone

= Clone sprite object =

This method will clone Sprite object and return a new one.

= Example =

{{{
// Create sprite
var oExplosionSprite = new jgen.Sprite(document.body, 'explosion.png', 87, 80, oEventQueue);
for (var c = 0; c < 5; c++) {
	var oExplosion = oExplosionSprite.clone();
	oExplosion.setPosition(c * 5, c * 5);
	oExplosion.setVisible(true);
}
}}}
